required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Lipid Profile and Weight After Pregnancy
clinical_study.official_title: Lipid Profile and Weight After Pregnancy

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized controlled trial aiming to investigate the effects of diet behavior intervention postpartum on body weight and lipid and metabolite profile in overweight and obese women in Oslo, Norway

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in body weight (kg) between visits.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
primary_outcome.description: Measured in light clothing without shoes. Together with measured height (m) will be used to calculate Body Mass Index.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in markers of lipid- and glucose metabolism between visits
primary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
primary_outcome.description: Measured in mmol/l: total cholesterol, low-density lipoprotein, high-density lipoprotein, triglycerides and glucose In percentage: HbA1c In pmol/l: insulin.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in lipid subclasses (mmol/l), lipoprotein size (nm) and apolipoproteins between visits
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
secondary_outcome.description: In g/l: apolipoprotein (apo) B and apo A1. In mmol/l: lipoprotein (a)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in blood pressure, diastolic and systolic between visits
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
secondary_outcome.description: Measured after 5 min rest, mean of 2 measurements (mmHg)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in waist and hip (cm) circumference between visits
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
secondary_outcome.description: A measuring tape specifically designed for waist circumference (Seca) will be used according to a standardized procedure Measurements will be taken against the skin at the approximate midpoint between the lower margin of the last palpable rib and the top of the iliac crest. Hip is measured over the widest point on the buttocks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in body composition (fat free mass in kg and fat mass in kg) between visits.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in circulating inflammation markers such as cytokines, high sensitivity C-Reactive Protein, C-Reactive Protein (CRP) and microCRP between visits.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in plasma metabolomics such as lactate, pyruvate, citrate and amino acids between visits.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in PBMC (peripheral blood mononuclear cell) gene expression levels of markers of inflammation and lipid metabolism between visits.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in levels of markers of inflammation and lipid metabolism at PBMC gene expression level.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in hemostatic markers such as plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 (PAI-1) antigen and von Willebrand factor (vWF) between visits.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
secondary_outcome.description: PAI-1 measured in ng/mL, vWF measured in IU/dl

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in hormones such as prolactin, estradiol, progesterone between visits
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in markers of micronutrient status such as Hb and vitamin D between visits.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in dietary intake and Food Choice by food frequency questionnaire at each of the 3 visits
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
secondary_outcome.description: Will be calculated in Norwegian Food database program

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in physical activity between visits.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Visit 1 (8 weeks postpartum, visit 2 (6 months postpartum) and visit 3 (15 months postpartum)]
secondary_outcome.description: The physical activity questionnaire describes 4 dimensions of activity (work, transportation, leisure time and exercise). Frequency, intensity or duration of the activity are reported as categorical data (3 or 4 categories).

intervention.description: 12-week program of dietary behavior modification treatment (LEVA-method by Bertz et al, Am J Clin Nutr 2012;96:698.), leading to 6 kg weight loss (0.5 kg per week) and a healthier diet (less sugar, snacks, full fat products, more vegetables and fruit, smaller portion sizes). Weight is monitored by phone contact every second week. After 12 weeks, the women are followed up by e-mail contact for 9 additional months.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women admitted to Adipol, Oslo University Hospital, Norway (outpatient clinic for women with overweight or obesity during pregnancy)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Twin birth,
- Non-Norwegian speaking

eligibility.gender_description: Women With prepregnant overweight or obesity (BMI>27)
